incident_number: A unique number assigned to a trip by the ambulance agency. This number can be used to pull the ACR or the ePCR.
company: An ambulance provider or supplier contracted with EMS|MC for billing and/or other administrative functions. Also known as a client.
run_number: A unique account number assigned to each trip by RescueNet Billing. (YY-XXXXXX 21-123456)
